title: I just leveled up to level 45 and I didn't get a level capsule or anything

replies.body: Strange....while I was double checking this for you I noticed that it doesn't seem like you got a normal capsule for level 44 either. I've gone ahead and added those for you, but if this happens again please reach out to our game team in a ticket ASAP so we can track this issue!
I just leveled up to lvl 45 and i did not receive anything either, can you add those for me too please :/
Should have it now ^_^! Make sure to refresh your client if you don't see it at first.
Sweet thanks. I totally didn't notice the level 44 one.
I didnt get one when I lvled up 35... thats really annoying cause its the only way to buy champs now.
Happened to me at level 40 as well.

Might possibly be a glitch in levels ending in 5. Maybe they original had “milestones” for every 5 levels but nixed that n now the spaghetti is causing random levels ending in 5 to grant nothing.

Edit: Apparently not, I didn't get one for level 44 either apparently thanks to Broporo.
